list: Your response will help us provide real-time information during the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak.
Information will be used by government to make crucial decisions for the population and the UK economy.

content.description: Thank you for completing this short survey at this challenging time.

list: Information should relate to the UK.
You do not need to provide actual data.
We will treat your information securely and confidentially.

questions.question: Section one: Financial performance of your business

content.description: This section asks for information on any changes during the last two weeks, and expectations for the next two weeks, to:

list: your business's turnover
your business's imports and exports
the availability and prices of materials, goods and services
your business's financial resources

questions.question: Section two: Operational performance of your business

content.description: This section asks for information any changes to the size and capacity of your workforce during the last two weeks and expectations for the next two weeks.

blocks.title: Financial performance of your business
blocks.description:
This section asks for information on any changes during the last two weeks, and expectations for the next two weeks, to:

  • your business's turnover
  • your business's imports and exports
  • the availability and prices of materials, goods and services
  • your business's financial resources

questions.title: Was the financial performance of {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} outside of normal expectations in the last two weeks?

content.description: This means usual for this time of year, or as a result of expected outcomes of standard business activities.

questions.title: Was {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s turnover within its normal range in the last two weeks?

content.description: This means within expectations for this time of year, or as a result of expected outcomes of standard business activities.

options.label: Yes, it was within the normal range
options.value: Yes, it was within the normal range

options.label: No, it was outside the normal range
options.value: No, it was outside the normal range

values: Yes, it was within the normal range

questions.title: In what way was {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s turnover outside its normal range in the last two weeks?

list: change expected due to seasonal effects
change expected due to normal patterns of business activity

questions.title: What do you think were the main causes for {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s turnover being outside its normal range in the last two weeks?
Please explain in more detail why {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s turnover was affected
What are your expectations about {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s turnover in the next two weeks?

options.label: Expect turnover to stay the same
options.value: Expect turnover to stay the same

questions.title: Has {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s exporting of goods or services been affected by the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak in the last two weeks?
Please explain in more detail how {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s exporting has been affected
What are your expectations about {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s exporting of goods or services in the next two weeks?
Was {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s importing of materials, goods or services affected by the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak in the last two weeks?
Please explain in more detail how {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s importing has been affected
What are your expectations about {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s importing of materials, goods or services in the next two weeks?
Was {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} able to get the materials, goods or services it needed from within the UK in the last two weeks?

options.label: Yes, we have been able to  get what we needed
options.value: Yes, we have been able to  get what we needed

options.label: Yes, but we have had to change suppliers or find alternative solutions
options.value: Yes, but we have had to change suppliers or find alternative solutions

options.label: No, we have not been able to get the materials, goods or services we needed
options.value: No, we have not been able to get the materials, goods or services we needed

values: Yes, we have been able to  get what we needed
Yes, but we have had to change suppliers or find alternative solutions

questions.title: Please explain why {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} was not able to get the materials, goods or services needed
How did the prices of materials, goods or services needed by {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} change in the last two weeks, compared with normal price fluctuations?

options.label: Some prices increased, some prices decreased
options.value: Some prices increased, some prices decreased

questions.title: Please give more details about the prices of materials, goods or services that changed
What are your expectations about changes in prices of materials, goods or services that {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} needs for the next two weeks?
Did {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} have to change the prices of your goods or services that were sold in the last two weeks?

options.label: Yes, we generally had to increase our prices

options.label: Yes, we generally had to decrease our prices
options.value: Yes, we generally had to decrease our prices

options.label: No, we did not have to change our prices
options.value: No, we did not have to change our prices

questions.title: Please give more details about how prices changed
What are your expectations about prices of goods or services that {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} will sell over the next two weeks?
Has {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}’s ability to access financial resources changed in the last two weeks?

options.label: Yes, access to finance has increased
options.value: Yes, access to finance has increased

options.label: Yes, access to finance has decreased
options.value: Yes, access to finance has decreased

options.label: No, access to finance has stayed the same
options.value: No, access to finance has stayed the same

questions.title: How confident are you that {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} has the financial resources to continue operating throughout the coronavirus (COVID-19) outbreak?

blocks.title: Operational performance of your business
blocks.description: This section asks you for information on any changes to the size and capacity of your workforce during the last two weeks, and expectations over the next two weeks.

questions.title: Was {{ metadata['ru_name'] }}'s workforce able to meet the demands of the business in the last two weeks?

options.label: Yes, the workforce could meet the business's demands
options.value: Yes, the workforce could meet the business's demands

options.label: No, the workforce could not meet the business's demands
options.value: No, the workforce could not meet the business's demands

questions.title: What measures has {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} taken to cope with the impact of coronavirus (COVID-19) on your workforce?

options.label: Staff are encouraged to work from home
options.value: Staff are encouraged to work from home

options.label: Staff have to work from home
options.value: Staff have to work from home

options.label: Laying off staff in the short term
options.value: Laying off staff in the short term

options.label: Recruiting staff for the short term
options.value: Recruiting staff for the short term

questions.title: In the last two weeks, roughly what proportion of your workforce was doing each of the following?

answers.label: Working at their normal place of work
answers.description: Include those who are normally remote workers

answers.label: Working remotely instead of at their normal place of work
answers.description: Exclude those who are normally remote workers

options.label: Expect workforce size to stay the same
options.value: Expect workforce size to stay the same

blocks.title: Other financial or operational changes
blocks.description: This section asks for information on any other changes to financial and/or operational activities not already covered in the last two weeks, and expectations over the next two weeks.

questions.title: Were there any other changes to financial or operational activities for {{ metadata['ru_name'] }} that were unexpected in the last two weeks?

definitions.title: Examples of financial and operational activities

list: Investment impacts
Stock changes
Widening or changing the range of goods and/or services produced
